opendial.modules.AudioModule

    opendial.gui  

    • Uses of AudioModule in opendial.gui

      Constructors in opendial.gui with parameters of type AudioModule 
      Constructor and Description
      SpeechInputPanel(AudioModule recorder)
      Creates the speech input panel, composed of a press and hold button and a sound level meter.
